short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay motivated and track your goals with the Turning Point extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turning Point is a custom Chrome tab extension that helps you track and achieve your goals effortlessly. With a user-friendly interface, it simplifies goal monitoring and keeps you motivated.
